description:
Absol is known as the "Disaster Pok√©mon" because it appears before natural disasters such as earthquakes and tidal waves. It lives in the rugged mountains, and only leaves to warn people of natural disasters with its innate ability to sense them through subtle changes in the sky and the land. People often accuse Absols of causing the disasters themselves, resulting in its reputation as a doom-bringer. It generally lives for up to one hundred years.
In Pokemon Mystery Dungeon: Red/Blue Rescue Team, an Absol makes a short appearance in Frosty Forest.
name: Absol
